message:
fix: DEV-2647: rotating bounding box bugs (#711)

* fix: DEV-2647: rotating bounding box bugs

* fix: DEV-2647: rotating bounding box bugs

* fix: DEV-2647: rotating bounding box bugs

* Use one mixin for 2- and 3-point rect

* fix: DEV-2647: handling rotated and reversed rectangles has veen improved

* Fix calculations of rect height after 2nd point

* fix: DEV-2647: fixing overflowing rectangles

* fix: DEV-2647: cursor no longer changes while hovering over other regions when drawing

* Fix contraints on mouse leave; whitespaces; ff check

FF check in global scope can be possibly over-optimized by webpack

* Remove console.log

Co-authored-by: hlomzik <hlomzik@gmail.com>
